code: import React from'react';import logo42 from'./assets/images/logo-42.png';import darklogo42 from'./assets/images/42-dark-logo.png';import'./assets/styles/navbar.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{isThemeSet}from'./choose_theme';import{isLogged}from'./login';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const isLightTheme=isThemeSet();const userName=isLogged();export function NavBar(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{id:isLightTheme?'navBarLight':'navBar',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Webserv"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginLink,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"https://42.fr/en/homepage/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"navLogo",src:isLightTheme?darklogo42:logo42,alt:"logo-42"})})]});}function LoginLink(){if(!userName){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Sign in"})})});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Hello ",userName]})});}}
